title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-6.2 - Availability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-6.2 - Availability

State Regulations

All material referenced in Parts 670 through 672 of
this Title is available for copying and inspection at the New York State

Department of Environmental Conservation, Division of Water, 625 Broadway, Albany, NY 12233. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
672-6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
